SEARCH
Package com.github.forax.zen

Interface ApplicationContext

public interface ApplicationContext
The application context
  • renders graphics instructions (Graphics2D) to the drawing area of the application,
  • waits or asks for a keyboard event or a pointer event.
This object is created by the Application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    dispose()
    Close the drawing area and dispose all the resources.
    ScreenInfo
    getScreenInfo()
    Returns screen information.
    Event
    pollEvent()
    Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.
    Event
    pollOrWaitEvent(long timeout)
    Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.
    void
    renderFrame(Consumer<Graphics2D> consumer)
    Render a whole frame of the game in one call into a buffer that is then copied to the screen.

  • Method Details

    • getScreenInfo

      ScreenInfo getScreenInfo()
      Returns screen information.
      Returns:
      screen information.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

    • dispose

      void dispose()
      Close the drawing area and dispose all the resources.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

    • pollEvent

      Event pollEvent()
      Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.

      This method returns immediately.

      Returns:
      an event or null if no event happens.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

    • pollOrWaitEvent

      Event pollOrWaitEvent(long timeout)
      Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called. This method waits until an event occurs.
      Parameters:
      timeout - maximum time to wait (in milliseconds).
      Returns:
      an event or null if the timeout is elapsed.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

    • renderFrame

      void renderFrame(Consumer<Graphics2D> consumer)
      Render a whole frame of the game in one call into a buffer that is then copied to the screen.

      This method tries to use the hardware acceleration, if possible.

      Parameters:
      consumer - a consumer that will be called to render the current frame.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.
